Hi all, there is some maintenance going on at aimoo at the moment so the usual address of http://NihonTo_Trader.aimoo.com is not working. There is a temporary address of http://www.aimoo.com/forum/freeboard.cfm?id=420242 and this works fine for the time being. Sorry for any inconvenience and thanks for the bandwidth.
